headline: W. R. Berkley (NYSE:WRB) Announces Dividend Increase And Special Cash Dividend
summary: W. R. Berkley (NYSE:WRB) recently announced an increase in its regular cash dividend and a special cash dividend, both effective from June 30, 2025, which could have positively impacted its share price. The company experienced a 17% share price increase over the last quarter, during which dividends might have reinforced investor confidence. However, the broader market trends show a general upward movement, with indices like the S&P 500 nearing record highs. Consequently, Berkley's price move...
